Quest.Name: Four Heads are Better than None

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: You must be Alliance to run this profile
You must be able to fly to use this profile.

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Save 8 gryphons, then press continue and bot will turn in

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Jump on a Gryphon and kill the noobs

CustomBehavior.Title: Escort
CustomBehavior.Text: Escort teh dorf\n\nPress continue when done

CustomBehavior.Title: Escort
CustomBehavior.Text: Find the Zeppelin flying around and board it, then steal the cloth (on the lower level in a box)\nJump off into water\nMount your flyer and press continue

CustomBehavior.Title: Escort
CustomBehavior.Text: Talk to Grundy and watch the cutscene and defend the wedding ceremony

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Kill the tentacles and save the 4 npc's\nMake sure you don't get digested!\nAfter that, kill the brain!

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Talk with the Lt and escort the squad up the canyon to the Dragonmaw Gate\nTalk with the LT at gate and use hand gestures button

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Talk with the Lt and escort the squad to Calen, just get passed the gate and walk the road to get credit
Talk with Calen passed the gate
I used my flying mount and flew on the left side of the mountains for less agro

Don't go far, after the cutscene, you have to mount a drake

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Kill 8 drakes
Target, press 1, it comes to you, press 3

Don't go far, you have another quest to do

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Use the chain on the drakes and kill them\n\nYet another CB I need made!

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Kill Obsidia\n\nThe next popup isn't for a while, but I would stay near the computer while running this, these mobs are mean

Objective.QuestName: Four Heads are Better Than None
Four Heads are Better Than None
Four Heads are Better Than None
Four Heads are Better Than None

TurnIn.QuestName: Four Heads are Better than None

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Wait here for a drake (x5) to fall down to the ground, then go in and smack it before it gets back up!
Look for Lirastrazsa blowing them up

The bot will fly you back

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Help kill Skullcrusher by running around and clicking on the altar's for buffs!

The bot will turn in for you

 Don't go far, we're done in TH

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Congrats, that's all of the quests. If you missed the water quests at the beginning, go and do those for some extra gold.
